attributes.action: listen to both the public and the petitions signed on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judging by the PM's replies to previous petitions, it is obvious that this system is something of a gimic. If 1.7 million people are just flatly ignored in the road pricing petition perhaps other petitions may fall to the same fate. Please consult the public more.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
